channel.title: web on xorkevin
channel.description: Recent content in web on xorkevin

item.title: Auth in a Nutshell: Cryptography
item.description: Authentication is often one of the most complicated portions of an application to design and write, simply due to the breadth of services that depend on it, and the depth of features that it as a service must provide.

item.title: Governor
item.description: As the amount of projects I have worked on grew, I noticed that many requirements were similar if not identical across them.

item.title: Nuke
item.description: Nuke was designed as a frontend for the Governor web framework project.
